  "description": "Ceragon Networks Limited (NASDAQ: CRNT) is the global innovator and leading solutions provider of&nbsp;5G wireless transport. We help operators and other service providers worldwide increase operational efficiency and enhance end customers&rsquo; quality of experience with innovative wireless backhaul and fronthaul solutions.&nbsp;

Ceragon&rsquo;s unique multicore technology and disaggregated approach to wireless transport provides highly reliable, fast to deploy, high-capacity wireless transport for 5G and 4G networks with minimal use of spectrum, power, real estate, and labor resources. We deliver a complete portfolio of turnkey end-to-end AI-based&nbsp;managed and professional services&nbsp;that ensure efficient network rollout and optimization to achieve the highest value for our customers. Our solutions are deployed by more than 400 service providers, as well as more than 800 private networks, in more than 140 countries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Manager - Utilities&nbsp;(Europe)

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Major Job Responsibilities


	Build, manage and maintain customer relationships directly into target market segments.
	Develop the go-to-market strategy and required partnering landscape to deliver significant business outcomes.
	Create and maintain a pipeline with potential customers and deals.
	Onboard anchor customers with disruptive commercial and business models.
	Pursue and present in-depth technical knowledge on our propositions and roadmap around Utilities.


Areas of Responsibility, Permanent Objectives and Duties


	Determine market strategies and goals for each product and service, understanding the strategies, goals and objectives of assigned accounts.
	Meet and exceed booking, margin quotas and revenue goals.
	Establish high levels of quality, accuracy, and process consistency in planning, forecasting, and budgeting approaches used by the channel organization. Ensures planning, forecasting and budgeting efforts are appropriately integrated with other planning processes employed within the organization.
	Setting up the overall sales strategy in the relevant areas: Creating and executing on a strategic plan to drive sales and profit growth in the vertical market.
	Developing new value propositions, use cases and campaigns.
	Prospect the right decision makers within a business to identify new business opportunities and bring an innovative approach to prospecting and acquisition, with a customer-oriented mindset.
	Identifying, evaluating, and recommending product and service enhancements that improve the overall value to our customers.
	Responsible to manage, build formal business proposals and presentations, presents to all levels of the organization including executives, leads negotiations, coordinates complex decision-making processes, and overcomes objectives to closure, and closes sales in a professional and effective manner.
	Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, technical developments, and government regulations that effect target markets.
	Ensure the CRM database is utilized appropriately and maintained on a regular basis, with forecast accuracy.
	Strong Hunting mindset.


Job Requirements
Qualification and Education:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree; Master&rsquo;s Degree preferred.
	5+ years of experience in System Integrator for IoT / Telco/Networking domain preferred within Defense Market.
	Excellent communication skills in English and knowledge of other language is an advantage.
	Previous track record of working within Utilities environment and expanding sales growth YoY.
	Established relationships within Utilities across Europe.
	Understanding of public sector procurement.
	Ability to travel.

Sales Manager - Utilities Job at Ceragon Networks Limited




        
    

        
        Ceragon Networks Limited (NASDAQ: CRNT) is the global innovator and leading solutions provider of 5G wireless transport. We help operators and other service providers worldwide increase operational efficiency and enhance end customers’ quality of experience with innovative wireless backhaul and fronthaul solutions. 
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Ceragon’s unique multicore technology and disaggregated approach to wireless transport provides highly reliable, fast to deploy, high-capacity wireless transport for 5G and 4G networks with minimal use of spectrum, power, real estate, and labor resources. We deliver a complete portfolio of turnkey end-to-end AI-based managed and professional services that ensure efficient network rollout and optimization to achieve the highest value for our customers. Our solutions are deployed by more than 400 service providers, as well as more than 800 private networks, in more than 140 countries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Manager - Utilities (Europe)

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Major Job Responsibilities


	Build, manage and maintain customer relationships directly into target market segments.
	Develop the go-to-market strategy and required partnering landscape to deliver significant business outcomes.
	Create and maintain a pipeline with potential customers and deals.
	Onboard anchor customers with disruptive commercial and business models.
	Pursue and present in-depth technical knowledge on our propositions and roadmap around Utilities.


Areas of Responsibility, Permanent Objectives and Duties


	Determine market strategies and goals for each product and service, understanding the strategies, goals and objectives of assigned accounts.
	Meet and exceed booking, margin quotas and revenue goals.
	Establish high levels of quality, accuracy, and process consistency in planning, forecasting, and budgeting approaches used by the channel organization. Ensures planning, forecasting and budgeting efforts are appropriately integrated with other planning processes employed within the organization.
	Setting up the overall sales strategy in the relevant areas: Creating and executing on a strategic plan to drive sales and profit growth in the vertical market.
	Developing new value propositions, use cases and campaigns.
	Prospect the right decision makers within a business to identify new business opportunities and bring an innovative approach to prospecting and acquisition, with a customer-oriented mindset.
	Identifying, evaluating, and recommending product and service enhancements that improve the overall value to our customers.
	Responsible to manage, build formal business proposals and presentations, presents to all levels of the organization including executives, leads negotiations, coordinates complex decision-making processes, and overcomes objectives to closure, and closes sales in a professional and effective manner.
	Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, technical developments, and government regulations that effect target markets.
	Ensure the CRM database is utilized appropriately and maintained on a regular basis, with forecast accuracy.
	Strong Hunting mindset.


Job Requirements
Qualification and Education:


	Bachelor’s Degree; Master’s Degree preferred.
	5+ years of experience in System Integrator for IoT / Telco/Networking domain preferred within Defense Market.
	Excellent communication skills in English and knowledge of other language is an advantage.
	Previous track record of working within Utilities environment and expanding sales growth YoY.
	Established relationships within Utilities across Europe.
	Understanding of public sector procurement.
	Ability to travel.

	We are seeking a creative, results-driven, and strategic Marketing Manager to lead the development and execution of comprehensive marketing strategies that drive student recruitment, enhance brand visibility, and support the University&rsquo;s growth objectives.

Marketing Manager Job at James Hope University




        
    

        
        James Hope University, Lagos, is a premier postgraduate institution dedicated to nurturing the next generation of business leaders, industry professionals, and high intellectual achievers. We offer cutting-edge programs and world-class facilities, providing our students with an unparalleled learning experience.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Manager
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary

	We are seeking a creative, results-driven, and strategic Marketing Manager to lead the development and execution of comprehensive marketing strategies that drive student recruitment, enhance brand visibility, and support the University’s growth objectives.
	As part of the Marketing and Communications team, you will play a key role in ensuring that James Hope University’s message reaches the right audiences in the most impactful way.


Key Responsibilities


	Strategy Development: Lead the creation and execution of innovative marketing strategies to increase awareness and drive engagement with prospective students, faculty, and partners.
	Campaign Management: Oversee integrated marketing campaigns across digital, print, and social media platforms. Track and measure performance to optimize campaigns.
	Brand Management: Ensure consistency and alignment with the University’s branding and messaging across all communication channels.
	Content Creation: Work with internal teams to develop engaging content, including blog posts, social media content, email newsletters, and promotional materials.
	Market Research: Analyze market trends, competitor activity, and audience insights to inform marketing strategies.
	Collaboration: Work closely with admissions, alumni relations, and academic departments to align marketing efforts with institutional goals and student needs.
	Budget Management: Manage marketing budgets effectively, ensuring resources are allocated to high-impact activities.
	Reporting & Analytics: Monitor and report on marketing performance metrics, providing actionable insights to senior leadership.


Key Requirements


	Education: A Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field is preferred.
	Experience: Minimum of 5 years in marketing, with at least 2 years in a leadership or management role, preferably within the education sector or a related field.


Skills:


	Strong expertise in digital marketing (SEO, PPC, social media, email marketing)
	Proven experience in campaign management, content creation, and analytics
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Proficiency with marketing tools and platforms (Google Analytics, Adobe Creative Suite, HubSpot, etc.)
	Mandatory proficiency in graphic design tools (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, CorelDRAW).
	Ability to think strategically and execute tactically


Attributes:


	Highly organized with an ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
	Creative thinker with a data-driven approach to decision-making
	Collaborative and proactive in building relationships across teams
	Passion for education and a genuine interest in enhancing the student experience.


Why Join James Hope University?


	Work in a dynamic and supportive environment where your work makes an impact.
	Access to professional development opportunities and career growth.
	A competitive salary and benefits package.
	Be part of a team that’s shaping the future of higher education and student success.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter outlining why they are the ideal candidates for this role to: hr@jhu.edu.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Business Development Executive Job at Sterling Homes Limited




        
    

        
        Sterling Homes Limited is a private limited liability company incorporated in, 2010, by the Corporate Affairs Commission, Abuja, Nigeria, under the Companies and Allied Matters Act (CAMA) 1990. Our incorporation number is RC.894767.

We are a real estate housing development, investment and allied Services Company. We are poised to do real estate excellently, reinventing the way real estate business is managed in Africa and giving customer service delivery a new outlook. Our mission is to be one of the top ten home providers for individuals and corporate bodies in the next five years. We buy lands, finance real estate deals, build or have builders build projects, create, imagine, control and orchestrate the process of development from the beginning to the end.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilites


	Developing a business development strategy focused on financial gain
	Arranging business development meetings with prospective clients
	Conduct research to identify new markets and customer needs
	Coordinating the activities of the Field sales Executives with weekly reports to the Human Resources Manager.
	Work hand-in-hand with HR to manage and evaluate performance of Field Sales Executives
	Managing and retaining relationships with existing clients
	Increasing client base
	Having an in-depth knowledge of business products and value proposition
	Preparing and presenting business proposals
	Negotiating with stakeholders
	Identifying and mapping business strengths and customer needs
	Following industry trends locally and internationally
	Reporting on successes and areas needing improvements.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an OND qualification with 2 years of work experience.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@sterlinghomesltd.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only candidate living withing Ojodu Berbger environ can apply.
